<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get schema for a single Bohr OGC API feature collection"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/collections/{collectionId}/schema"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get schema for a single Bohr OGC API feature collection

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"collectionId","in":"path","description":"A known collection ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["region","boundary","infrastructure","survey","survey_runs","survey_coverage","survey_indications","survey_indication_areas","survey_routes"]},"example":"region"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Schema for an Bohr OGC API feature collection.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"object"}}}}},"400":{"description":"The schema request is not supported. Please refer to documentation for examples."},"404":{"description":"Collection '{collectionId}' is not a supported Collection. Please refer to the documentation for a list of supported Collections."},"405":{"description":"The HTTP method requested is not supported. This endpoint only supports 'GET' requests."},"406":{"description":"A request header value was not supported."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
